title: SEO Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Alaska Business Development Center (Baltimore, MD)
Interview Descriptions: My experience interviewing with Pluralsight was that their process was fast and efficient. The recruiter I worked with communicated each step clearly and explained each interview step. You do have to pass a couple assessments, though. Everyone I interacted with was very kind and professional. The final step before a decision is made is a panel with managers and directors. They run the interviews very conversationally. How they treat you during the hiring process is exactly how they treat you once you're hired - like family. As with any interview, know your why and how you think you'll be a great fit. Try and understand Pluralsight's solution and be prepared to speak to why you'd be a successful rep.
Interview Questions: How long do you want to work here?

title: Full Stack Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Alaska Business Development Center (Anchorage, AK) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was casual and centered around questions that involve how I did in work at my previous jobs while there were some brain teasers, very intersting interview process and absolutely a great interview.
Interview Questions: What were you responsibilities in your last position?
